  />
</a>
This playpen uses `useState` to manage the state of the canvas. It allows the user to draw on the canvas
by tapping on an interactive grid of squares. The square's `onPress` handler is used to update the state
of the canvas.

**[Open in Play](https://developers.reddit.com/play#pen/N4IgdghgtgpiBcIAiAnCB3CAjANjABAMIRgBuEAziADQgUoDGCIAllAA4D2KALvsEhilSLHgF98AMxSco+AOQABACZCRPAPTsArrhYMAtBHYt5AHTAWGnMBT7Wc3CvgC8+ANoX8+MyADEAGJBwb7UXj7+AAzRMaHhvn4AogBCAKwA7BlxYN4JAQBMAJyFACwAgtm5--YGeEhs1G3DHLWrgc8wG8SOQKKnLPKXaciBSUGaYHgPZS3MCka5dcC094ADwACzs7pe+HQLGUPBHLl8Y2iAFJfPgIDgWABzMCwMA8BcgBgwfcwFC+bWD53ADQw752GDKfBjy0MSc8Tj4b5buP4LcyX4oQ0MQr2HF8J3wLBuCVQ85xYSwQD--ANHex6aR4jN-xnM0Fv2cWwXhSEchhPTBf13jJEs0M9godhN2DAEIEBIceW1YE1qBcUeXcGZcxgLc9x4AAZE8tzncUwG0KAsDPJEg5DkOMeEjMwRJHh05mTO3BD+nnUkSlgTwPgWH2SI5hY-Ah3XT3ARRPAwDjkd65rgBqNxAwjiKY47ude2Fbbc9JFEdAoEd-ZblEKE3Y8-Jh-Ae48wf92Hzu9avLW1h4bRsNhCg89Lwa-tdd4a32NzOO48rSCR7asJw-DlEIlzfBIsiZuMqCKAYK+DgghSi3MxISSNsoE2ClhYzlFsAaBsD9JXnerxOSbtRD-CBMCdWFB-QWwhIiVEdEGIAXRo-eyiMvramAABMQn0JzoOdI9LWJ1n60J+qXNMh9j45CocdXAnA3wUBYcOThEEfzsGIqRTEa4RbzkXCuNcECxqRRAEuSIq5EKhR3JHQ8x5TwoHwNFZkeAKKY0bjfT4OtkpDmTG2DsH4TF2OehoSRd0EYaGEaI3W4RVJiCRIsb46ouC8HwAmPO+A6TqBoCAL0KBzg2AQGMMQQA)**
